alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 01 at 11:59AM CST until January 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CST FOR EASTERN HENDERSON AND DECATUR COUNTIES... At 1159 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Reagan, or near Lexington, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Decaturville, Reagan, Darden, Scotts Hill, Busseltown, Jeannette, Rock Hill, Mount Tabor, Middle Fork, Timberlake, Hinson Springs, Cozette, Perryville, Gumdale, Warrens Bluff, Wilkinstown and Palestine. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
